channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Book Review: The New World Economy in 5 Trends
item.description: A diligent economist and an eclectic bookworm serve up an analysis of megatrends that will have the greatest impact on economies and investments: innovation, productivity, climate, multiglobalization, debt, and aging.

item.title: Meet the 102-year-old healthy-living pioneer who was espousing ‘wellness’ long before it was a trend
item.description: The founder of the famed Rancho la Puerta resort says that not worrying is more important than what kind of water you drink.

item.title: Factor Strategies Belong in Your Completion Portfolio Toolkit
item.description: Why wouldn't you include factor strategies in your completion portfolio? A review of the two commonly used approaches for managing institutional assets highlights their symbiotic nature.

item.title: Families of slain Uvalde victims sue Meta, 'Call of Duty' maker, and gun manufacturer: 'This three-headed monster knowingly exposed him to the weapon'
item.description: “There is a direct line between the conduct of these companies and the Uvalde shooting,” said Josh Koskoff, an attorney for the families.

item.title: For the Analyst: Peer Benchmarking Methods to Improve Earnings Forecasts
item.description: Peer benchmarking is a vexing task for financial analysts but one that is critical for forecasting earnings. This straightforward measure can help find peers for relative performance, compensation, and valuation benchmarking.

item.title: A law firm tried to blame a 9-year-old girl for not noticing an iPhone camera a former American Airlines flight attendant secretly taped to a toilet seat
item.description: A former American Airlines attendant is accused of luring girls to use the lavatory after taping his iPhone to the toilet seat and explaining that the seat was broken.

item.title: Building LLMs in the Open-Source Community: A Call to Action for Investment Professionals
item.description: Large language models like ChatGPT are changing the way we think about investing and reshaping roles in the investment profession.

item.title: CEO at $14 billion electronics firm can’t talk about his resignation following an internal investigation
item.description: The former exec can only say “no comment” in response to queries, according to restrictive covenants with an unusual provision.

item.title: Sustainability Reporting: Navigating Assurance Practices
item.description: Don't be lulled into a false sense of security by the word "assurance" when evaluating sustainability reports. Assurance practices vary, and investors would be wise to learn more about the different levels of coverage.

item.title: Front-end developers: These are the states where you’ll find the highest average salaries
item.description: Front-end developers work on the visual aspect of websites, and can earn relatively high annual salaries. The states where they’re paid the most, though, may surprise you.
